decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings titled:
P01, P02, P03 REV.A, Heritage Statement/ Design and Access Statement (REF:1911)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The roof lights hereby approved within the front roof slope shall be installed as conservation roof lights only, and permanently retained.

REASON: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), D6 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and Bedford Park Conservation Area Management Plan.
description: Alterations to existing single storey ground floor rear out-rigger extension, including alteration to the existing eaves line and inclusion of a conservation area rooflight. Replacement doors to the rear elevation and enlargement of existing window to the side elevation.
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
